mapper.select:
SELECT rpd.requested_product_code AS pCode, rpd.contract_code AS contractCode, rpd.client_code AS clientCode, ci.client_name AS clientName, rpd.approval_status AS approvalStatus, rpd.requested_product_detail_reg_date AS regDate FROM requested_product_detail AS rpd INNER join client_info AS ci on rpd.client_code = ci.client_code
AND rpd.client_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{clientCode} ,'%')
AND ci.client_Name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{clientName} ,'%')
AND rpd.contract_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contractCode} ,'%')
AND rpd.requested_product_detail_reg_date >= DATE(#{requestRegDateFrom})
AND rpd.requested_product_detail_reg_date <= DATE(#{requestRegDateTo})
AND rpd.approval_status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contractAcceptCheck} ,'%')
